div.p: Standardized value set that describes the trend or status of a disease, condition, or ability. Based on LL2751-7, LL4721-8.

description.value: Standardized value set that describes the trend or status of a disease, condition, or ability. Based on LL2751-7, LL4721-8.

display.value: Not detected. Use this term for expressing NED (no evidence of disease), condition resolved, or full remission.
Equivocal. Equivocal represents a borderline value, too close to call; for example, a value very close to a cut-off between positive and negative.
Indeterminate. Indeterminate means the results were uninterpretable, or cannot be determined; technical issues prevented obtaining a valid result.
